properties.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Northern Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:21AM PST until January 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches
expected in lower valleys, 2 to 6 inches in higher elevations
and midslopes with up to 8 inches in mountains. Winds gusting as
high as 45 mph will cause areas of blowing snow.

* WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains/East Humboldt
Range.

* WHEN...Through 10 PM PST Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult especially
along SR-225 and US-93. Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty
winds Saturday afternoon could lead to blowing snow causing
significantly reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
